name: NSTableView.RowActionEdge
desc: These constants define table row edges on which row actions are attached. They are used by the tableView:rowActionsForRow:edge: delegate method.

items.name: case leading
items.desc: Denotes the leading, or left, edge of a table row view.

items.name: case trailing
items.desc: Denotes the trailing, or right, edge of a table row view.
